attributes.action: Stop Council Tax  inspectors invading our households.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government plans to allow local councils to send inspectors into our homes with a view to bumping up our council tax if we have made improvements or have a pleasant outlook. This is a monstrous invasion of our civil liberties. I feel my home is my castle and my sanctuary from the outside world. Anybody coming into my home is at my invitation.  Being forced into compliance is totally unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
